The Showroom Glow

Every time you drive your car should be a moment of pride.

Clean

We clean vehicles inside and out to
appear like new every time

Polish

We polish vehicles to sparkle
like the jewels they are

Protect

We protect your vehicle to
maintain the Extreme Detail shine

Feels like driving a new car, even if it is 10 years old.

At Extreme Detail Center, we make that happen.

Our mission is nothing less than giving automobiles that Showroom Glow.
And in the process, making it Forever New!

Much like a fine gem, we clean, polish and protect it with a level of
professionalism and dedication that is unparalleled.
